keys in brief pass keys are a
specification that is built on top of
web offn which allows for public key
cryptography to replace passwords
instead of presenting something you know
to prove your authenticity you present
something you have which is a hardware
device holding your private key the
challenge with this historically is that
sometimes you lose that thing you have
which means you don't have it anymore
and you're locked out pass Keys build on
web aen by providing Cloud sync of your
credentials to other devices that you do
have hence IOS and Android play a big
